118866.ancillaryPanelDesc:
Protects you from the costs that arise when a sickness, an injury or another unexpected covered risk causes you to cancel your trip or disrupt your travel plans. Cancellation insurance must be purchased at the time of initial travel deposit.
  • Before Departure:Before Departure insurance covers the non-refundable portion of prepaid travel arrangements, due to the cancellation penalties that may be charged by the transportation carrier or tour operator.
  • After Departure:After Departure insurance covers the costs associated with an early or delayed return, and the non-refundable portion of unused prepaid travel arrangements.
  • Subsistence Allowance: Subsistence Allowance insurance provides the reimbursement of expenses incurred as a result of one of the specified insured risks. Expenses can include your commercial accommodations and meals, essential telephone calls, and taxi fares, up to the specified maximum.
118866.name: Cancellation And Interruption Insurance

BPC.description:
What you need to do now:
  • Click on the ‘pay now with SID’ button below.
  • If it’s your first time on SID, you’ll be prompted to run the application.
  • SID will direct you to your selected bank (for login and payment) in a secure process.
  • kulula banking details are pre-populated for you (so there’s no need to worry about  the details).
  • You‘ll be guided by text on the yellow bar at the top of the screen.
  • Once ‘successful’ you will be directed back to the kulula confirmation page.
  • In the event that your payment is unsuccessful, you’ll be required to make a new booking.
  • Direct any queries to our Contact Centre ((84-4) 3 8320320 / (84-8) 3 8320320).

flightAdvisory.US:
1. As per US government policy, passengers are required to have appropriate travel documents for flights on all concerned airlines and to follow national laws and regulations. Vietnam Airlines does not take responsibility if passengers are denied entry into any country. Please visit here for more details.
2. You can cancel your reservation and receive a full refund without penalty within twenty-four (24) hours after the reservation is made if the reservation is made one (1) week or more before departure. After this twenty-four (24) hour period, the refund amount will be calculated based on the fare rules of the ticket.
3. Please visit here for further information on our policy.

SID.content: What you need to do now: Click on the ‘pay now with SID’ button below. If it’s your first time on SID, you’ll be prompted to run the application. SID will direct you to your selected bank (for login and payment) in a secure process. Banking details are pre-populated for you (so there’s no need to worry about the details). You‘ll be guided by text on the yellow bar at the top of the screen. Once ‘successful’ you will be directed back to the confirmation page. In the event that your payment is unsuccessful, you’ll be required to make a new booking. Direct any queries to our Contact Centre.
SID.title: Payment must be completed through SID and within {days, plural, =0 {} =1 {1 day} other {# days}} {hours, plural, =0 {} =1 {1 hour} other {# hours}} {minutes, plural, =0 {} =1 {1 minute} other {# minutes}} {seconds, plural, =0 {} =1 {1 second} other {# seconds}} or this booking will be automatically cancelled.

payLater.holdYourBooking:
Pay later
Pay by one of the following forms of payment: Internet Banking, Mobile Banking, ATM card, pay by cash at Bank counter, Airpay agent, Convenience store which has connected with Payoo (Vinmart, The gioi di dong,…) or Pay by installments using credit card issued in Vietnam.
Note:
Reservations made from 25 hours before departure: Pay within 12 hours from booking time and at least 24 hours before departure, except:
 - Flights operated by Vietnam Air Service: pay within 1 hour
 - International Flights: pay within 2 hours
Reservations made within 25 hours before departure: Pay within 01 hour from booking time
Please read carefully the payment instruction in the reservation sent to your email address.
Only transactions under 200,000,000 VND are allowed.

payment.termsAndConditions:
Change conditions

1. Economy Super Lite fares:

  • Vietnam Domestic routes: not permitted
  • Other routes: not permitted, permitted with/without fee depending on the rules of each fare type.

2. Economy Lite fares:

  • Vietnam Domestic routes: permitted with fee
  • Other routes: not permitted, permitted with/without fee depending on the rules of each fare type

3. Other fare types: permitted without fee depending on the rules of each fare type

Cancellation/Refund conditions

1. Economy Super Lite fares:

  • Vietnam Domestic routes: not permitted
  • Other routes: not permitted, permitted with/without fee depending on the rules of each fare type

2. Other fare types: permitted with/without fee depending on the rules of each fare type

3. When you combine different fare types, the conditions of the most restrictive fare applies to your entire itinerary.

4. Prepaid Baggage and Preferred Seat fee: Refund is not permitted
5. Secure my fare fee: Refund is not permitted

  • Routes departing from Australia, Thailand, Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, Laos, Cambodia, Myanmar, Philippines: Permitted with fee
  • Other routes: not permitted

    • 2. Special Deal fares:
    Vietnam Domestic routes:
  • Before ticketed flight date: permitted with fee
  • After ticketed flight date: not permitted
  • Other routes: permitted with fee

    • 3. Other fare types: permitted with/without fee depending on the rules of each fare type

Cancellation/Refund conditions
    1. Super Saver fares:
  • Routes departing from Korea: permitted with fee
  • Routes departing from Thailand, Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, Laos, Cambodia, Myanmar, Philiipines: permitted with fee for P booking class only
  • Other routes: not permitted

    • 2. Special Deal fares:
  • Vietnam Domestic routes: not permitted
  • Other routes: permitted with fee

    • 3. Other fare types: permitted with/without fee depending on the rules of each fare type

seat.exit-row-disclaimer:
This is an exit row seat
For safety reasons, if you're seated in an exit row, you must meet the following minimum requirements:

  • At least 15 and not over 60 years of age.
  • In good condition, not be pregnant, not travelling with infants or pets.
  • Be able to read and understand instructions required related to emergency evacuation, provided in printed or graphic form and be able to understand oral crew commands.
  • Not requiring an extension seat belt because of large body size.
  • Not have any condition that might prevent you from performing any or all evacuation assistance functions (e.g. operating the exit door).
Please note: : the crew in command has the authority to reseat you if there’s any doubt about your ability to assist with evacuation tasks.

 I understand and agree to all of the above.

upgrade.content:
Upgrade Travel

Enjoy the luxurious comfort of Business Class or Premium Economy Class.

Refund/ Exchange Request

To contact Vietnam Airlines staff for assistance, please send your request of ticket refund/exchange here.

TRIPCARE TRAVEL INSURANCE

TripCARE, provided by PVI and reinsured by Chubb, covers up to VND 1.6 Billion for personal accident, medical expense and travel inconvenience, with 24/7 worldwide assistance.

Special Services

Vietnam Airlines is in business to provide safe and friendly air transportation to our customers along with numerous related services. Your safety, comfort and convenience are our most important concerns.

upgrade.contentmyb:
Extras

Upgrade Travel

Enjoy the luxurious comfort of Business Class or Premium Economy Class.

Refund/ Exchange Request

To contact Vietnam Airlines staff for assistance, please send your request of ticket refund/exchange here.

TRIPCARE TRAVEL INSURANCE

TripCARE, provided by PVI and reinsured by Chubb, covers up to VND 1.6 Billion for personal accident, medical expense and travel inconvenience, with 24/7 worldwide assistance.

Special Services

Vietnam Airlines is in business to provide safe and friendly air transportation to our customers along with numerous related services. Your safety, comfort and convenience are our most important concerns.

SabreDxContainerCheckInEmailBoardingPass.greetingText: Thank you for using our Mobile Check-in Service.
SabreDxContainerCheckInEmailBoardingPass.priorityList: Please find your Priority Verification Card below and also for your convenience we have attached it so it can be printed. Your Priority Verification Card can be used to go through security but you’ll need a boarding pass to board the aircraft.
SabreDxContainerCheckInEmailBoardingPass.bodyContent:
Please find your mobile boarding pass below and also for your convenience we have attached the Web Check-in boarding pass that can be printed. Your Boarding Pass needs to be carried along with your passport to gain entry into the departure area of the airport, as well as the aircraft.

The following points should also be noted:
SabreDxContainerCheckInEmailBoardingPass.noMobileBoardingPassAvailableContent:
Mobile boarding passes are not available at this moment. For your convenience, we have attached the Web Check-in boarding pass that can be printed. Your Boarding Pass needs to be carried along with your passport to gain entry into the departure area of the airport, as well as the aircraft.

The following points should also be noted:
SabreDxContainerCheckInEmailBoardingPass.someMobileBoardingPassAvailableContent:
Not all Mobile boarding passes are available at this moment. For your convenience, we have attached the Web Check-in boarding pass that can be printed. Your Boarding Pass needs to be carried along with your passport to gain entry into the departure area of the airport, as well as the aircraft.

The following points should also be noted:
SabreDxContainerCheckInEmailBoardingPass.termsAndConditions:
• For guests with check-in baggage, please arrive at the airport at least 90 minutes prior to flight departure time and visit a baggage drop counter in the check-in area.
  • All guests must arrive at the boarding gate at least 45 minutes prior to departure. Our boarding gates close 20 minutes before departure.
  • Once you have checked in and have received your mobile boarding pass, you will not be able to make any changes online through our website.
  • All existing terms, cancellation rules and allowances apply.

• The minimum qualified amount is 2,500 miles per flight per passenger.
• Passengers must travel together during the journey.
• Miles cannot be reimbursed in case of ticket refund.
For more information, please click here.
